functional_requirements: User authentication with the capability to register, login, and logout.
Ability to create, edit, and delete tasks.
Feature to categorize tasks using labels.
Option to set due dates and priority levels for tasks.
Capability to assign tasks to team members.
Send email notifications for upcoming deadlines.
Provide a dashboard that displays task statistics.
Ensure the interface has a mobile-responsive design.
non_functional_requirements: Pages should load in under 2 seconds.
The system should be secure and protect user data.
The system should have availability of 99.9% uptime.
user_types: Registered users who can manage tasks.
